DOC.brief_summary: To determine rate Composite Neonatal Morbidity preterm baby deliver secondary preterm labor ( PTL ) vs. prelabor rupture membrane ( PROM ) . Composite neonatal morbidity define ≥ 1 following : Respiratory Distress Syndrome ( RDS ) ( oxygen requirement , clinical diagnosis , consistent chest radiograph ) , bronchopulmonary dysplasia ( BPD ) ( requirement oxygen support 28 day life ) , severe intraventricular hemorrhage ( IVH ) ( grades III IV ) , periventricular leukomalacia ( PVL ) , blood culture-proven sepsis , necrotizing enterocolitis ( NEC ) , perinatal death ( stillbirth death neonatal hospital discharge .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , observational study use information medical record mother newborns . This study seek determine rate Composite Neonatal Morbidity preterm baby deliver secondary preterm labor ( PTL ) vs. prelabor rupture membrane ( PROM ) . Composite neonatal morbidity define ≥ 1 following : Respiratory Distress Syndrome ( RDS ) ( oxygen requirement , clinical diagnosis , consistent chest radiograph ) , bronchopulmonary dysplasia ( BPD ) ( requirement oxygen support 28 day life ) , severe intraventricular hemorrhage ( IVH ) ( grades III IV ) , periventricular leukomalacia ( PVL ) , blood culture-proven sepsis , necrotizing enterocolitis ( NEC ) , perinatal death ( stillbirth death neonatal hospital discharge . Secondary Objectives : 1 ) Difference mortality PTL PROM group , composite morbidity difference reason premature delivery , individual morbidity include IVH , PVL , RDS , sepsis , seizure , BPD NEC Study Population : All baby singleton pregnancy deliver involved hospital deliver less 32 week gestation stillborn , die delivery room care Neonatal Intensive Care Unit ( NICU ) include . Planned Sample Size : We plan two year study estimate base historical data institution include study , yield approximately 6000 baby less ( < ) 32w0d gestation . For 10 % difference composite morbidity ( assume 90 % power two-sided alpha=0.05 ) assume rate 60 % least 661 patient need 3 group ( PTL , PROM , ) .
